title: PiBot Web Installer
subtitle: Flash your PiBot device directly from your browser
errorWebSerialNotSupported: Web Serial API is not supported in your browser. Please use Chrome, Edge, or Opera.
successFlashed: Firmware flashed successfully! Your PiBot device is ready to use.
instructionText1: Your PiBot device board requires you to hold the BOOT button (also labeled as FLASH or GPIO0) during connection.
instructionText2:
Steps:
1. Click "Connect & Flash PiBot device" below
2. Hold the BOOT button on your PiBot device
3. Select the COM port in the dialog
4. Choose "Install [project name]" (not "Logs & Console")
5. Keep holding BOOT until you see "Connected" in the console below
6. You can release the button once flashing starts
projectComingSoon: Coming soon - This firmware is not yet available for installation.
browserWarning: This installer requires a Chromium-based browser (Chrome, Edge, or Opera) with Web Serial API support.
bootModalText: Hold the BOOT button on your PiBot device board now. Keep holding until you see "Connected" message. The button may be labeled as BOOT, FLASH, or GPIO0.
